DialogueNodes.Text: Hey Sis! I was just coming to get you!
Dad drugged us so that he could bring us here and lock us in.

Responses.Text: Why would Father leave us here?

DialogueNodes.Text: We're broke Greta, they can't afford to feed all of us anymore, and stepmother doesn't like us
I was with Daphne, she came and woke me up and took me to her apartment.

Responses.Text: Why would Father leave us here?

DialogueNodes.Text: He did, Sis... it's gonna be okay, because we have Daphne now.
Oh Sis, Daphne is amazing! She can take care of us now! You have to come and meet her!

Responses.Text: No Hans! I don't want to meet her, I want to go home!!!
Hans I'm scared. I just want to go home...

DialogueNodes.Text: Why do you always have to ruin everything!?!
Don't worry Sis, everything is going to be okay, we have Daphne now. I'll go and get her and you just come and meet us on floor 3 in a little while.
This is gonna be great! I can't wait for you two to meet! I have to go and tell her! Just come and meet us on floor 3 in a little while.
(Before you can say anything else, he sprints up the stair's and you hear a door slamming shut. Leaving you standing there alone.)
